featured.text: The tower, of pinewood, will be built on eight pillars and will be topped with a flower of five metal petals of 700 square meters each.

definition.zh_def: 花瓣是花的外部部分，通常色彩鮮豔，吸引授粉者。
definition.en_def: A petal is a colorful part of a flower that attracts pollinators.
definition.example: The rose's petals were soft and fragrant.
